publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3917 Dr Jean Turner: Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that the high-quality essential services provided by the voluntary sector to a wide range of children and families, many of them from vulnerable groups, is not jeopardised by any freeze on vital funding for such voluntary sector organisations. Supported by: Christine Grahame*

S2M-3917 Dr Jean Turner: Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that the high-quality essential services provided by the voluntary sector to a wide range of children and families, many of them from vulnerable groups, is not jeopardised by any freeze on vital funding for such voluntary sector organisations. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Chris Ballance*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*
S2M-3917 Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services (lodged on 2 February 2006) Alex Neil*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-3917 Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services (lodged on 2 February 2006) Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3917 Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services (lodged on 2 February 2006) Mr David Davidson*, John Swinburne*
S2M-3917 Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services (lodged on 2 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-3917 Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services (lodged on 2 February 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-3917 Voluntary Sector Provision of Vital High-Quality Essential Services (lodged on 2 February 2006) Elaine Smith*
